---
title: Methods
engine: knitr
params:
  task_id: label_projection
---


```{r params-dummy}
#| include: FALSE
#| eval: FALSE
params <- list(
  task_id = "label_projection"
)
```


```{python}
#| include: FALSE
import re
import openproblems as op

# task_ids = [ x for x in dir(op.tasks) if not re.match("^_", x) ]
task_ids = [ params["task_id"] ]

out = []
for task_id in task_ids:
  task = getattr(op.tasks, task_id)

  for fun in task.METHODS:
    x = {'task_id': task_id, 'method_id': fun.__name__}
    y = x | fun.metadata
    out.append(y)
```

```{r}
out
```
